Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0495 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-25
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0495 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-25. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-buildx is earlier than 0.7.1-25, affected by CVE-2025-0495
